sentences: Ma olen pidevalt üritanud saavutada oma eesmärke.
Kas ta on veel kunagi üritanud seda teha?
context: The Estonian word 'üritanud' is the past participle form of the verb 'ürita', which means 'to try' or 'to attempt'. It is used to indicate that someone has made an effort or attempted to do something in the past. In this case, it's in the negative form with a particle showing lack of action - suggesting an unsuccessful attempt or simply no attempt at all.
